A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointed. As a Star Wars fan I wanted to love it\, and there were some pretty great parts\, but there were also terrible and infuriating parts and the humour was off tone. Searching my feelings while leaving the theatre\, the sum was not a Star Wars movie I was hoping for or expecting and I was ultimately disappointed with what I had watched. How on earth did this director lock down a further trilogy based on this just baffles.
